total_subquestions_ys: Q1: Identify the two distinct areas in the grid that are surrounded by 8s and contain 0s and other numbers.
Q2: Isolate these two areas from the rest of the grid.
Q3: Remove the surrounding 8s from these isolated areas.
Q4: Identify the pattern in the isolated areas (in this case, a 4x4 square with a specific pattern of numbers).
Q5: Apply this pattern to the isolated areas in the quiz input grid.
Q6: Replace the numbers in the isolated areas of the quiz input grid with the numbers from the identified pattern.

Q1: Identify the two separate sections of the grid that are surrounded by 8s.
Q2: Remove the surrounding 8s from each section.
Q3: Identify the unique color in each section.
Q4: Create a new grid for each section, maintaining the unique color and the 0s.
Q5: Combine the two new grids into one, placing the second grid below the first.
